name: Lyrics
description: Lyrics plugin that downloads lyrics from lrclib.net with configurable search options
overview: Lyrics plugin with configurable search options and automatic library scanning

versions.changelog:
## v1.3.0.0
### What's New
- Fixed a lot of plugin loading issues
- Fixed GitHub Action Workflows

## v1.2.0.0

### What's New
- 🔧 Fixed plugin conflicts with Jellyfin's built-in LrcLib plugin
- 🌍 Unique plugin GUID to prevent uninstallation conflicts
- 🔗 Distinct task key to avoid scheduler conflicts
- 📈 Improved plugin independence and stability

### Technical Improvements
- Enhanced plugin isolation from Jellyfin core components
- Better version management and release process
- Updated documentation and installation instructions

## v1.1.0.0

### What's New
- 🎵 Renamed plugin from "LrcLib" to "Lyrics" for better user experience
- 🔧 Fixed build compatibility issues with .NET 8.0 and Jellyfin 10.9.x
- 📦 Improved build artifacts and CI/CD pipeline
- 📂 Fixed plugin categorization from "Notifications" to "Metadata"

### Technical Improvements
- Consistent versioning across all project files
- Better package compatibility with Jellyfin 10.9.x series
- Improved documentation and installation instructions
